Author: Little-Rexy
Text: At one time I had my leg and arm strapped down and I was turned on my side and told to swallow the tube- I refused at first and it really fucked me up. Flash forward I had to go to the ENT last year and he put a scope in my nose. I freaked the fuck out crying and shaking out of the blue. I had to explain what had happened to me. I feel your pain from here. I can only lend my ear and tell you your not alone with the mistreatment. I think it happened to me because I am a guy.
